company_info.name: Poornasree AI
company_info.mission: Empowering businesses with intelligent AI solutions

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is Poornasree AI?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Poornasree AI is a cutting-edge artificial intelligence platform designed to automate customer support, enhance user experiences, and provide intelligent business solutions.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How do I begin using Poornasree AI?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Simply create an account, upload your training data, configure your AI model, and start integrating our intelligent responses into your workflow.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What file formats can I upload for training?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: We support PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, JSON, and CSV files. Our system automatically extracts and processes content for optimal AI training.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How long does AI training take?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Training typically takes 30 minutes to 2 hours depending on data size and complexity. You can monitor progress in real-time through our dashboard.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Can I integrate with existing systems?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes! Our comprehensive API allows seamless integration with most customer service platforms, websites, and business applications.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What support options are available?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: We provide 24/7 technical support, comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, and dedicated customer success managers for enterprise clients.

training_tips: Use diverse, high-quality training data for best results
Include various conversation scenarios in your dataset
Regularly update training data with new examples
Monitor AI performance and retrain when necessary
